subtitle: Find safe fruits and vegetables for your dietary restrictions
noResults: No foods match your selected restrictions.
selectFilters: Please select at least one restriction filter.

disclaimer.title: IMPORTANT SAFETY DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.text: This tool is NOT designed for life-threatening food allergies (e.g., peanuts, wheat, shellfish) or Celiac disease. This tool does NOT track cross-contact risks. The tool only filters known intolerance profiles (e.g., FODMAP, Histamine) of foods in their generic (unprocessed) states. If you have a serious allergy, DO NOT USE this app.
disclaimer.medicalDisclaimer: The information provided is for informational purposes only and does not constitute professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.

seo.title: SafeEats - Find Safe Fruits & Vegetables for Diet Restrictions | Keto, Histamine, FODMAP, GERD Filter
seo.description: Filter safe fruits and vegetables for your dietary restrictions. Find foods suitable for Keto, low Histamine, low FODMAP (IBS), and low Acid (GERD) diets. Free diet restriction filter tool.
seo.keywords: fruit sugar diet, low sugar fruits, keto fruits, histamine intolerance foods, low histamine fruits, FODMAP foods, IBS diet, GERD diet foods, low acid fruits, diet restriction filter, safe foods for allergies, fruit vegetable filter, dietary restrictions, keto vegetables, low sugar vegetables
